titlealts.searchtitle: Attribute: INITIAL DIAGNOSIS CARE SETTING OR SERVICE FOR HIV - Description

div.p: The type of care setting or SERVICE in the United Kingdom where the initial Human Immunodeficiency Virus (HIV) positive diagnostic test was performed.

National Code 06 'Emergency Care Department
(including minor injuries department)' has been updated in DCB0092-2062: Commissioning Data Sets: Emergency Care Data Set. The Data Set specifications that contain this item will be updated in the next version of the Information Standard where it is not already correct.
